scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ speaking with the Samaritan woman at the well. Christ, dressed in a dark blue robe with gold trim, sits on a stone block, gesturing with his right hand. The Samaritan woman, wearing a red outer garment, a blue undergarment, and a distinctive headdress, stands by a well, holding a bucket. A jug sits on the ground near Christ. The background shows a landscape with trees, hills, and a blue sky. The scene is framed by architectural elements, including columns and an arch.
scene_interpretation: Christ and the Samaritan Woman at the Well
